metadata.title: CVE-2022-32983 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Knot Resolver through 5.5.1 may allow DNS cache poisoning when there is an attempt to limit forwarding actions by filters.

notes.note: ccdm94> there seems to be no fix for this issue, only a documentation update in commit ccb9d979.

criterions.comment: knot-resolver package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
